page.title: 02Prestwood Schoolday 9/5/85
page.content: The alarm on my scramble-game went off at 6.30. I groaned and sat up. I got dressed quickly because it was cold in my room. I went downstairs and had two wheatabixes and a cup of tea. I opened the back patio doors and went down to the shed. I got out the edger, the edging shears and the fork. I started with the edger going round the outside of the lawn, making a straight edge all round. Next I got the edging shears and went round the edge cutting all the grass that grows over the edge. Next I got the fork. I turned over all the soil and made the dry crust on the top go underneath making the wet soil go on top. Next I went inside and got my bag ready for school. I got to Sarah Emsley's house and we walked up to school. Sarah carried my bag and I carried my cello. The first thing we did was Maths - Division of decimals -
